settings.content:
Free no contact delivery for all orders

Dispatched in: 1-3 business days
Take your time to decide whether or not Emma is for you
Every Emma product is top-notch quality

settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
Construction & Materials

Removable and washable top cover: 98% polyester and 2% elastane.

- Cooling Thermosync Foam
- Hypersoft Airgocell® Foam
- Visco Foam for better support

Washing Instructions

Simply remove the elasticated top cover and pop it in the washing machine – at a maximum of 60°C. Avoid washing the pillow interior. In the case of spills or mishaps, the premium foam layers will return to normal once dry.

settings.title: Dimensions
settings.content:
Pillow Size: 28 x 16 in
Total Weight: 3.3 lbs
Filling Weight: 2.64 lbs

settings.title: Certifications
settings.content: Cover and core (foam layers) are certified with a Class II (19.0.91049) of OEKO-Tex Standard 100.

settings.upsell_mattress_text: Discover the Shift : Perfect comfort with maximum cooling and adjustable firmness →

settings.title: Emma Premium Cooling Pillow
settings.desc:
The perfect blend of firmness, support and freshness

Discover our thermoregulating pillow fitting any type of sleeper thanks to its adjustable layers

  • Thermosync technology capturing excess heat for optimum sleep temperature
  • Easy-to-clean & machine-washable for a clean, refreshing sleep
  • OEKO-Tex Standard-100 certified against allergies and skin irritation
  • Try it for 60 days with the Emma promise
settings.caption_headline: Loved by back, side, and stomach sleepers
settings.caption_content: Breathable and cooling for the absolute best quality of sleep

settings.title: More deep sleep, less waking up in a sweat
settings.content: No more waking up in a sweat, thanks to ThermoSync technology. The Premium Cooling Pillow features our special cooling foam, capturing excess heat for optimum sleep temperature. A regulated temperature favorises deep sleep phases and promotes a restful sleep without micro-awakenings throughout the night.

settings.title: Adjustable layers for perfect comfort
settings.content: If you like to sleep on your stomach, keep just 1 layer in the pillow. For back sleepers, try 2-3 layers and see which you like more. And for side sleepers, keep all 3 layers for maximum support and comfort. You can mix and match the layers and the order they’re in so that you find your ideal comfort.

settings.title: The perfect blend of firmness, support and coolness
settings.content:
Enjoy undisturbed sleep thanks to our thermoregulating, adjustable three-layer pillow that fits any type of sleeper.
Moisture-resistant cover that's machine washable too.

settings.title: Easy to clean
settings.content: Our Premium Cooling Pillow is made from our highest performing and most durable foams. This means it retains its shape overnight and over time. It is non-toxic and easy to clean: just remove the cover and put it in the washing machine.

settings.title: Ultradry cover
settings.desc: The cover's UltraDry technology rapidly wicks away moisture, ensuring the perfect cool, dry sleep.

settings.title: ThermoSync cooling foam
settings.desc: The graphite Thermosync coating guarantees extended deep sleep phases thanks to temperature regulation. Body temperature quickly drops to a level that promotes restful sleep.

settings.title: The soft foam that feels like a cloud
settings.desc: Heavenly sleeping climate thanks to breathable Airgocell® foam. The softest layer of the three.

settings.title: Visco-adaptive foam
settings.desc: The visco-adaptive foam supports the head and neck with extreme precision for you to sleep in a state of total relaxation.

settings.heading: Premium Cooling Pillow - Layer by Layer

settings.desc:
Our Most Awarded Memory Foam Mattress for Budget-Conscious Sleepers

  • Most awarded mattress and budget-friendly
  • 5 unique layers with minimal motion transfer
  • Breathable and moisture-wicking

Our Top-Rated Plush Hybrid Mattress for Demanding Sleepers

  • Top-rated plus hybrid for maximum comfort
  • 7 unique layers with zero motion transfer
  • Cooling for hot sleepers

Our Newest Mattress, Offering Personalized Comfort for Every Type of Sleeper

  • Our newest technology with maximum comfort and support
  • Adjustable firmness on either side
  • Titanium-infused foam for extra cooling and optimal pressure relief

settings.title: Sleeping will never be the same
settings.subtitle: Experience rave-worthy comfort on a mattress that suits your every sleep need

settings.title: How does the Hybrid Comfort feel?
settings.subtitle: MATTRESS FIRMNESS SCALE
settings.description: On a 1-10 scale (soft to firm), the Hybrid Comfort is a 6 (medium firm). This means that you’ll feel the cloudlike comfort of modern memory foam while still having just the right amount of support to protect your back and hips as you sleep soundly through the night.

settings.title: Best quality sleep I've ever had!
settings.content: I didn't realize how bad my previous mattress was until I received my Emma mattress. Not only do I sleep straight through the night (mind you, I sleep with my partner and dog and don't feel their movements at all!), I wake up energized and well rested. I no longer have any body aches and never feel too hot/too cold. Highly recommend!
settings.author: Jonathan W.

settings.title: I can't wait for bedtime now!
settings.content: Sharing a conventional mattress that is sagging, with a long legged whippet was a disaster - most mornings I fell out of bed with him pushing me out. I now wake up every morning with much less pain and even the dog seems to love it!
settings.author: Judy K.

settings.title: Uninterrupted sleep all night
settings.content: This was recommended to me by my friend since I've been waking up in the middle of the night with my old mattress. So glad I listened cuz now I've been sleeping straight and waking up without a sweat
settings.author: Nicole W

settings.title: Perfectly satisfied with my mattress...
settings.content: Perfectly happy with my mattress and pillows. What a joy this bed is, the only regret would be not buying it sooner 🙂
settings.author: Marion

settings.title: Best quality sleep I've ever had!
settings.content: I didn't realize how bad my previous mattress was until I received my Emma mattress. Not only do I sleep straight through the night (mind you, I sleep with my partner and dog and don't feel their movements at all!), I wake up energized and well rested. I no longer have any body aches and never feel too hot/too cold. Highly recommend!
settings.author: Jonathan W.

settings.title: Great for couples
settings.content: We've tried orthopedic mattresses in the past, but returned it because they're TOO firm. I prefer soft ones, while my husband prefers firm. For some strange reason, this mattress just works for the both of us. His back pain's gone and I've been sleeping like a log every night!
settings.author: Donna C.

settings.title: Best sleeping with Emma
settings.content: My wife and I love this mattress because we never wake up during sleeping time, and we don't get lower back pain after we wake up.
settings.author: James L.

settings.title: High quality mattress!
settings.content: I have used Emma Mattress for more than a month now and I'm totally in love with it. The quality of the mattress and comfort is definitely noteworthy. I would highly recommend using Emma if you are looking for premium quality mattress
settings.author: Javeria A.

settings.title: Excellent hybrid mattress
settings.content: Excellent mattress, not too firm and not too soft, either! I got the pillow too, which I got to adjust by taking out one layer. I'm a side sleeper so the flexibility here was a gamechanger for me
settings.author: Ben A.

settings.heading: Mai Le, Mom
settings.content: We've had our emma mattress for about 2 weeks and holy smokes I can attest to the zero partner disturbance... because I co-sleep and even with me moving around getting up it doesn't disturb my baby girl 🙌

settings.heading: Alex Liang, Interior Designer
settings.content: No bedroom redesign would be complete without a new mattress! And we’ve been really enjoying my new Emma Original. It’s soft, yet supportive and keeps us comfortable and cool all night long. I also love that the entire cover of the mattress can be removed and machine washed, to keep the mattress fresh and new.

settings.heading: Lee Sartori, Author
settings.content: I've fallen in love with my Emma Mattress 😍. The Mattress sort of expands when you open it which made me think it would be way too soft. Surprise, it is actually very firm while keeping your sleep comfy and soft 😴💕. Because it's a memory foam mattress, you can sleep (or crochet) comfortably next to someone without disturbing them at all which is fantastic. All in all, I highly recommend!

settings.heading: Aya G, Content Creator
settings.content: Emma has, no joke, given me the best sleep quality I've ever had (!!!) - I get to sleep straight through the night without being disturbed by any movements or noises, I no longer get any shoulder/back aches and the temperature is always *just* right. I now wake up happier and more energized to take on my day. ⚡️

settings.heading: Sylvana Carda, Mom
settings.content: Even superheroes sleep at night 🦸🏻‍♂️💫 Baby sleeps in his bed, but in the morning he joins us in our bed and I share my pillow with him. After using the pillow, I have much less neck pain unlike before when I wake up in the middle of the night and need to adjust my pillow several times.

settings.heading: Lena Almeida, Mom
settings.content: I couldn’t be happier! The mattress and pillows are cool, breathable and offer just the right support to help me drift off to dreamland. 💤 The best part? I barely feel my husband’s movement throughout the night, which has improved the quality of my sleep enormously.

settings.heading: Orsida Luzati, Mom
settings.content: Who knew that a new mattress would have such a positive impact in our lives! The girls have found their favorite bed– soft and comfortable mattress (with motion isolating foam) and a 3-layer pillow with option to remove a layer for best comfort💗

settings.heading: Jessica Tyler, Content Creator
settings.content: I no longer wake up feeling like I’ve aged several years overnight with back pain! The support and comfort of this bed is seriously unmatched. Our bedroom has easily become my favorite room in the house - I already can’t wait to get back into bed tonight! 💤
